sourceMeaningMnemonic: A <radical>tree</radical> <radical>can</radical> be a <radical>tree</radical>, but it can also be a <radical>psychopath</radical>. The tree goes from being a regular tree to being a psychopath. Such mood swings are so rough. Especially when the tree slips to <kanji>gloom</kanji>.
meaningInfo: Imagine all the mood swings of this tree. Psychopath tree! Also very gloomy sometimes.
readingMnemonic: Then the tree switches from <kanji>gloom</kanji> to being super excited (these moodswings!). The super excited tree starts doing dubstep. <reading>Uts</reading> (<ja>うつ</ja>) uts uts uts uts <ja>♬</ja>.
readingInfo: Sing along with the moody tree. Gloom to dubstep. Such a big change.
